title: TONY MONTANA ROCKS!
review: I finally saw this much talked about movie the other day, and have to admit - I was spellbound.  It's a great mix of romance, comedy, and emotions.  There's also violence, greed, lust, everything a movie needs to make it a blockbuster - which Scarface DEFINITELY is!

title: A Sequel That's Actually Better Than The Original!
review: FABULOUS!  I've never seen Al Pacino or Robert DeNiro portrayed in this way before - they were absolutely magnificent.  I still can't get over the fact that Godfather:  Part II is indeed much BETTER than the original!  :)  Watch it!

title: Okay, Now I'm In Love...
review: Can you believe the 3rd part in a trilogy can be BETTER than the first two!?!  Godfather:  Part III proves this with ease.  I could watch the three parts anytime, and always notice something different and new.  Al Pacino is of course the central, main character, and no one could've done a better job.  I have bought all Godfather memoribilia now and am loyal to this epic!!

title: It'll Make You An Offer You Can't Refuse
review: The Godfather left me completely speechless after watching it.  Once you realize there's a Part II, you quickly go out and buy that as well.  Al Pacino & Marlon Brando are superb in this epic!
